column4: great and getting better sounds awesome, SiRrUs :)
lunitik ...do either of you know how to move the trash icon from the panel to the desktop
lunitik i have lots of space on the desktop
yes the gconf worked great...now i have it back on the desktop and the panel which is ok with me
yes i guess that would work...i am not really sure of sudo's limitations...i never used it that much
i only used sudo to run programs as root...i never tried building directories and moving files with it
ok...thank you very much for the advice
there are many people who still don't trust reiserfs
